mean_cn: n. 不能忍耐；过敏反应
mean_en: the fact of not being willing to accept ideas or ways of behaving that are different from your own
sentence: A defensive gesture is the expression of intolerance.
sentence_trans: 一个防御性的手势是她忍无可忍的表现。
word_etyma: in不，无 + toler 容忍 + ance表示状态、情况、性质、行为 → intolerance（尤指对别人的意见）不宽容
